entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is a character who is sobbing and begging not to harm Harry Potter. He claims that it really is Potter and asks the Death Eater not to hurt him.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is a character who is being referred to by Xenophilius as the person they are trying to protect. The Death Eater is skeptical of this claim.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of people who are trying to harm Xenophilius and Potter. They are led by Selwyn.

entities.name: selwyn
entities.description: Selwyn is the leader of the Death Eaters. He is described as a wizard who is shouting at Xenophilius.

entities.name: crumple
entities.description: Crumple is a location that the Death Eaters are trying to get proof about in order to return their girl.

relationships.description: Xenophilius is protecting Potter and claims that it really is him.
The Death Eaters are trying to get proof about Crumple in order to return their girl.
